Reviews.Title: Fits just right.
Reviews.Author: Sparks64
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32" LED TV for the bedroom but had very limited height space. I looked for a long time and came up with only a few choices. I picked this unit because of the sound leveling feature (was tired of loud commercials at night). Also wanted a TV with a narrow bezel. The TV arrived in less than 24 hrs. .... GREAT. It installed perfectlly using the mounting stand. Its been only 3 or 4 weeks now but everything works great. The picture while not as good as my 26" Sony LCD Bravia or 58" Panasonic plasma is very good. Also, the sound leveling feature really does work.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32 LED HD TV New
Reviews.Author: sharonmeredith
Reviews.Content: I am sorry for the person that wrote this first review.The Toshiba LED TV product is one of the best on the market. See the electonic website reviews like cnet. we just got the 40".  We Have ATT Uverse.  It is AWESOME.  The graphics, sound, i cant Say enough about it.  It really does look like the people are right there in the room with you.  Maybe you need to work on your settings and learning how to use it.  We have a Samsung before this. And we have not had any problems with the remote although we have to use the ATT remote for most functions, which is fine, but the toshiba remote is just fine too.  We got it direct from Toshiba because we didnt want to wait. Evidently they are pretty popular.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: BillK
Reviews.Content: This LED HD TV was just what I was looking for. I wanted a 32" TV to fit into a cabinet that I had a 26" TV in. I only have 30" to work with. The Toshiba 32" is 29.5" wide so it fit like a glove. I have had good luck with Toshiba's so I was comfortable with the purchase. The picture, sound, and features are equal to a higher end TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Gladys Fuenmayor
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price! Good Video quality, and its able to use 1080p video! The only bad thing about this tv is the Sound, it sucks! but i use my home theater with the DTS out on the tv

Reviews.Title: Good picture and Sound, But
Reviews.Author: Big P
Reviews.Content: The shipping was fine, got it when promised. This set has a good picture and sound. However setting it up was difficult because it does not come with a users manual. You have to go on line to get it. Also the stand is very flimsy and cheap. Also like other reviewers I find the remote is cheap. I compare it to one you get at the dollar store. As other reviews have stated the set does freeze at times when changing channels. But for $249.00 it is not a bad TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Value on the Remanufactured set.
Reviews.Author: J. Hubert
Reviews.Content: Great value.  It's a remanufactured TV, and their is some kind of anomaly with some of the red LEDs in the upper left quadrant of the screen, but you can only see it when the TV first turns on.  The audio on this model is vastly superior to the 2011 model (see reviews of that model elsewhere).  Surprising considering how thin and lite weight this TV is compared to the 2011 model.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted
Reviews.Author: Susan K Creager
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a new tv for our den and this one is perfect. It has a great picture and sound, and the price was definitely a plus. We would highly recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: The color is off when using HDMI
Reviews.Author: Alex D
Reviews.Content: My roommate bought this TV with my Prime account and we have been kind of unhappy with it. It works great as a television, but whenever we hook up his computer through the HDMI port to watch netflix or play a game, the color is VERY green. We tried adjusting the settings on the TV (it won't adjust far enough), and on his graphics card (same problem). We even installed some third party software to further adjust it, which made it better but it is still noticeably off color. We tried his computer on some different TVs and did not have this problem at all, it is just this TV. We have also hooked up other computers to this TV, and they also had this problem, but not to the same extent.Anyway, this TV has bad color when hooked up to computers so I wouldn't recommend it for anything more than using the coax input.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV & Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Stargazer
Reviews.Content: What a great TV and it was priced right! The picture and sound are awesome too! I am very pleased with this purchase and it made a wonderful gift as well.

Reviews.Title: juanjosegavidia_13@hotmail.com
Reviews.Author: juan jose
Reviews.Content: muy contento con lo esperado en muy buen estado nuevo con todos sus manuales y muy bien protejido la entrega fue rapida lo recomiento

Reviews.Title: I read the reviews first
Reviews.Author: Kristeen
Reviews.Content: so knowing I would be getting a good picture and a not so good audio experience I went for it. The tv is nice, the pic is nice, yes the audio leaves a lot to be desired and I will be purchasing speakers eventually, but for now it is a good tv at a good price

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Blwone
Reviews.Content: Put our Toshiba up today.  Not only does it have a great picture, the slim design looks really good.  No regrets!

Reviews.Title: Boo, Toshiba has zero intrest in customer service
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: TV laste 38 days. Custormer service was no help, it has been months and still no resolve.  I would stick will Sony from now on, way better customer service.

Reviews.Title: OK picture, Frozen problem
Reviews.Author: L. Nguyen "CamDigger"
Reviews.Content: Just get the TV for one week. Picture is not sharp, compare to my old LCD SONY 32' (I put the 2 side by side and compare), the picture is not clear and crispy enough (although it is LED and I've cranked up all the settings). Another problem is the remote control (or TV). When you change the channel so fast, TV just frozen up and the problem won't go away until you turn off the TV and turn on again. Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32L4200U 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Carolina Da Silva "CAROLDAS"
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant to order this article, I can say after buying it which is excellent, is offered, the image quality is spectacular, very bright, the sound is very good, only to place a 5.1 surround system you purchase a digital audio adapter to handle the volume control on the TV, otherwise you will have to use two controls ... Reasonable price and all the audio and video inputs you need, I recommend it to all the Amazon community. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I splurged...
Reviews.Author: m wisney
Reviews.Content: I have a very small house so this 32" television was ample...The base is ok, seems any flat screen bigger than a 15" screen is a little off kilter...It has been ponged off of by the cat via the stand getting swept out from under the screen and recovered perfectly...The speakers are crazy loud...can usually set between 7 and 9...if huge surround sound movie house volume is desired I set on 12-14...  The only complaint is that my VHS player wasn't compatible...Lucky for me I had saved my old Toshiba television and hooked up my Toshiba VHS back to it...  Over all Happy with my investment...Toshiba has shown to be a great product

Reviews.Title: American
Reviews.Author: Chester Tollison
Reviews.Content: My old RCA tv still woking great.This 32 inch Toshiba LED TV blows  my RCA away.I watched a movie a few days ago.I was shocked;the detail was awesome.It showed a rope,Icould see the brading in the rope that I could not see on my RCA TV.I am very happy.Great investment!!!

Reviews.Title: maybe 3.5
Reviews.Author: F. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, but the sound isn't so awesome and the remote is less than perfect.  That said, i use it with the roku and only use the remote for power and volume.  The best part about this is how thin it is.  Matched with a low profile wall mount its is very unobtrusive.

Reviews.Title: OK TV.Terrible remote control.Update: Terrible TV
Reviews.Author: Young
Reviews.Content: The TV was sold by Amazon.com LLC. Very fast shipping.No complain about the quality of the sound and picture. However, terrible remote control and even the control on the TV itself. TV seems not really responsive to any changes (changes channel, volume,on/off, etc.) The remote control feel cheap, I hope it will last, only time can tell.Another problem is the packaging. The box got damaged everywhere. It looks like that this TV has been shipped from oversea to my house and has gone through a lot.For now, this TV can only get 2 stars. If it can last more than 1 year, I will upgrade it to 3 stars and that will be the most this TV can get. It would be an excellence bedroom TV (will be 4 stars), if not for the annoying remote control.(!5 stars TV will be my LG32LV2400 which I was able to get for $334 after tax (new)!)Update 05/03/2012: It seems like the TV gets frozen if you keep changing channel. I can't replicate the out come, it just gets frozen when ever it feels like, so I'm hesitated to call Toshiba. (The only to unfroze it is turning off the power).

ProductInfo.Features:
Say goodbye to standard-definition with 720p HD resolution
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 29.3'' x 18.6'' x 1.8'', TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 29.3'' x 19.9'' x 7.1''
Dynamic backlight control for deeper blacks and more detail.
Easily connect to high definition video and amazingly immersive surround sound in one cable.
USB Media: Easily connect to your favorite tunes and photos, create slideshows, or listen to your personal playlists with this feature.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 32L4200U 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV (Black)
